problem_statement: Modern applications need a safe and flexible way to release features without redeploying code. Enabling a feature for all users at once increases the risk of bugs, outages, and poor user experience. Teams also need the ability to test features with specific users, gradually roll out changes, and instantly disable problematic functionality. This project addresses these challenges by providing a centralized Feature Flag Management System that allows controlled feature releases, user-specific overrides, and percentage-based rollouts through a secure, backend-driven architecture with a minimal administrative interface.
FAIL_TO_PASS: should have correct role enum values
should return false for disabled flag
should return true for enabled flag with 100% rollout
should return false for enabled flag with 0% rollout
should be deterministic for same user and flag
should evaluate multiple flags for user
should have correct input types for login form
should handle different users for same flag
should have correct action types defined
should have all required API endpoints defined
should return evaluated flags for user
should list all flags with overrides
should create audit log for CREATE
should create audit log for UPDATE
should create audit log for DELETE
should create audit log for OVERRIDE_CREATE
should create audit log for OVERRIDE_DELETE
should support audit log filtering by flagId
should support audit log filtering by userId
should support audit log filtering by action
